block.p: Rachel Patricia Alvy, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Norman Alvy of Merrick, N.Y., was married last evening to Richard Scott Relkin, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Allen Relkin of Roslyn Heights, N.Y. Rabbi Alan B. Lucas performed the ceremony at the Shelter Rock Jewish Center in Roslyn, N.Y.

The bride, 31, is a law clerk to Judge Dickinson R. Debevoise of Federal District Court in Newark. She graduated from Ithaca College and the New York Law School. Her father is a partner in Alvy & Tablante, a law firm in Lake Success, N.Y. Her mother, Susan Alvy, manages the Rockville Racquet Tennis Club in Rockville Centre, N.Y.

Rachel Alvy, Richard Relkin Rachel Patricia Alvy, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Norman Alvy of Merrick, N.Y., was married last evening to Richard Scott Relkin, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Allen Relkin of Roslyn Heights, N.Y. Rabbi Alan B. Lucas performed the ceremony at the Shelter Rock Jewish Center in Roslyn, N.Y.

Rachel Patricia Alvy, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Norman Alvy of Merrick, N.Y., was married last evening to Richard Scott Relkin, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Allen Relkin of Roslyn Heights, N.Y. Rabbi Alan B. Lucas performed the ceremony at the Shelter Rock Jewish Center in Roslyn, N.Y.

The bride, 31, is a law clerk to Judge Dickinson R. Debevoise of Federal District Court in Newark. She graduated from Ithaca College and the New York Law School. Her father is a partner in Alvy & Tablante, a law firm in Lake Success, N.Y. Her mother, Susan Alvy, manages the Rockville Racquet Tennis Club in Rockville Centre, N.Y.

The bridegroom, 30, is an executive producer at NY1 News, the cable news network. He graduated cum laude from the State University at Binghamton, N.Y. His father is a financial adviser in Jericho, N.Y., for Morgan Stanley, the investment bank. The bridegroom's mother, Ellen Relkin, is a substitute teacher in the Temple Beth-El nursery school in Great Neck, N.Y.
